snippet: A bill passed by the Senate Judiciary Committee, which would also limit the size of magazines, had tenuous prospects before the entire Senate and House.
abstract: Senate Judiciary Committee approves measure to reinstate ban on assault weapons; ban remains unlikely to clear full Senate.
lead_paragraph: A bill passed by the Senate Judiciary Committee, which would also limit the size of magazines, had tenuous prospects before the entire Senate and House.

headline.seo: Senate Panel Votes to Renew Assault Weapons Ban
headline.main: Party-Line Vote in Senate Panel for Ban on Assault Weapons
headline.print_headline: Panel Votes to Renew Assault Weapons Ban, but Prospects in Full Senate Are Dim
